name: part_002
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】魔法少女ホロウィッチ！THE STAGE【#ホロウィッチ】 [WV2_cgUA8cc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Hajimari no Mahou -charm-' by the HoloWitch group.
MC section: The HoloWitches celebrate their victory over the Holapser and decide to split into teams to showcase more magic.

subtitles.original: 歌おう
subtitles.english: Let's sing

subtitles.original: 見つけたあなたの中に ちっぽけな
subtitles.english: I found it inside of you, a tiny

subtitles.original: 輝きの原石
subtitles.english: gemstone of brilliance.

subtitles.original: どうして私だけ上手くいかないんだろう
subtitles.english: Why am I the only one who can't do things right?

subtitles.original: 自分以外の全てが眩しく見えるけど
subtitles.english: Everything except me looks so dazzling.

subtitles.original: ねえ君に見つけて欲しくて
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to find me.

subtitles.original: なりたい私になる今こそ
subtitles.english: Now is the time to become the me I want to be.

subtitles.original: そうだ叶えたい 掴みたい 夢があるから
subtitles.english: That's right, because I have dreams I want to fulfill and grasp.

subtitles.original: 塞ぎ込んだ日々の事も連れ出すんだ
subtitles.english: I'll take even those gloomy days with me.

subtitles.original: 信じる力が奇跡起こすように
subtitles.english: So that the power of belief can make a miracle happen.

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ We cast a spell on your dream
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you, we cast a spell on your dream.

subtitles.original: 叶わぬ望みと 叶わない願い
subtitles.english: Unattainable wishes and unfulfillable desires,

subtitles.original: それぞれが等しく流れてく世界で
subtitles.english: in a world where each flows equally.

subtitles.original: 何を求めて歩き続けるんだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder what I'm walking towards, searching for.

subtitles.original: いつもそんな事ばかり迷うけど
subtitles.english: I'm always lost in thoughts like that,

subtitles.original: 君がくれたこの空が
subtitles.english: but this sky that you gave me

subtitles.original: 消えない翼をくれたね
subtitles.english: gave me wings that won't disappear.

subtitles.original: そうだ照らしたい 届けたい 人がいるから
subtitles.english: That's right, because there's someone I want to shine for and reach.

subtitles.original: 誰一人置いて行ったりしないと決めたんだ
subtitles.english: I've decided I won't leave anyone behind.

subtitles.original: 愛したい 答えたい 自分自身の
subtitles.english: I want to love, I want to answer my own

subtitles.original: 正解なんて越えて行こう 未体験のステージ
subtitles.english: correct answer, let's go beyond to an unexperienced stage.

subtitles.original: どんな場所でもいいよ
subtitles.english: Any place is fine.

subtitles.original: どんな姿でもいい
subtitles.english: Any appearance is fine.

subtitles.original: 追いかけたいんだ あの煌めきを
subtitles.english: I want to chase after that sparkle.

subtitles.original: 希望 今は光 痛み 全て
subtitles.english: Hope, now light, pain, everything...

subtitles.original: 抱きしめて持って行こう
subtitles.english: let's embrace it all and take it with us.

subtitles.original: ほら繋げたい 広げたい 道があるから
subtitles.english: Look, because there's a path I want to connect and expand.

subtitles.original: ここから始まる物語を一緒に行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go together into the story that starts here.

subtitles.original: 信じる力が奇跡起こすように
subtitles.english: So that the power of belief can make a miracle happen.

subtitles.original: この手を握って 一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Take this hand, because you're not alone.

subtitles.original: 君に魔法をかけるよ We cast a spell on your dream
subtitles.english: I'll cast a spell on you, we cast a spell on your dream.

subtitles.original: ホラップサー、撃退完了ー！
subtitles.english: Holapser, repelled!

subtitles.original: ありがとう、ホロウィッチ！ すっごくかっこよかったよ！
subtitles.english: Thank you, HoloWitch! You were so cool!

subtitles.original: ホラップサーは、あれで全部かな？
subtitles.english: Was that all of the Holapsers?

subtitles.original: そうじゃない？ でかいのが出てきそうな感じもしないし。
subtitles.english: I think so? It doesn't feel like a big one is coming out either.

subtitles.original: じゃあ、もう戦い終わりなのかな？
subtitles.english: So, is the battle over now?

subtitles.original: 今回はサクッと勝てて良かったななね！
subtitles.english: It's great we won so easily this time, nanane!

subtitles.original: いつも結構苦戦させられるもんね。
subtitles.english: We usually struggle quite a bit.

subtitles.original: 船長たちも魔法少女が板についてきたってことかな？
subtitles.english: Does that mean we've finally settled into our roles as magical girls?

subtitles.original: そうですね、もう何度も魔法を使って戦ってましたし。
subtitles.english: That's right, we've fought using magic so many times already.

subtitles.original: 魔法！ ファンの皆さんももっとホロウィッチの魔法が見たいと思いますよ！
subtitles.english: Magic! I'm sure the fans want to see more of HoloWitch's magic too!

subtitles.original: んじゃ、エリートの魔法いっちゃお！
subtitles.english: Well then, let's show off some elite magic!

subtitles.original: いっちゃおうかな？
subtitles.english: Should we?

subtitles.original: 6人でっていうのはさっきやったし、今度は3人ずつチームに分かれてみる？
subtitles.english: We just did it with all six of us, so how about we split into teams of three this time?

subtitles.original: 賛成ななな！ まずはルーナたちがやるななな！
subtitles.english: I agree, nanana! Luna's team will go first, nanana!

subtitles.original: じゃ、お手並み拝見といきましょう。
subtitles.english: Then, let's see what you can do.

subtitles.original: がんばってねー！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: がんばれー！
subtitles.english: Do your best!

subtitles.original: がんばってー！
subtitles.english: You can do it!

subtitles.original: よし、じゃあ行くならよ！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's go!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: ホロウィッチ、チーム・ラスタ、フルキャスト！
subtitles.english: HoloWitch, Team Lasta, full cast!

subtitles.original: 甘くて幸せなこと
subtitles.english: Sweet and happy things,

subtitles.original: 隠し味は何にしよう
subtitles.english: what should I use for the secret ingredient?

subtitles.original: 純粋な乙女心
subtitles.english: Pure maidenly heart,

subtitles.original: 甘い恋も絡めなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to mix in sweet love too.

subtitles.original: 切なさもちょっと混ぜてみる Feel you
subtitles.english: Try mixing in a bit of sadness, Feel you.

subtitles.original: 酸味も積み上げたらタルト
subtitles.english: If you stack up the sourness too, it's a tart.
